Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at an exclusive price of $1800000. This opportunity not only represents a significant investment in quality but also an acquisition that could potentially grow in value over time. We believe in the transformative power of our product and trust it will bring you unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Should you find this proposition appealing, we would be more than happy to discuss further details and ensure a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
